name: Gertjan van Noord
content: Gertjan van Noord Home Page Gertjan van Noord https://orcid.org/0000-0001-5564-6341 University of Groningen PO Box 716 NL 9700 AS Groningen Harmonie 11-431 G.J.M.van.Noord@rug.nl Research material, including electronic versions of most of my publications and information on projects I work(ed) on (such as Ovis, Alpino, Imix, D-Coi, IRME, Lassy, Daisy, Duoman, Paco-MT, TTNWW, QTLeap, Nuance Foundation,PaQu). Not so recent Unifocus video. Software, including Alpino, FSA Utilities, Hdrug, Textcat Home Page of CLIN. Computational Linguistics in the Netherlands. Overview of CLIN meetings. Course material is now available only through Brightspace I walk a lot, and enjoy nature, you can follow my adventures in my looblog (in Dutch).
